name: Timeless (itch) (LunaBerryl)
description:
*Controls:

-W-A-S-D/Directional pad: Move
-Ctrl: Slow down time

*Story:

-Train your time magic skills in a puzzle for preparing to enter to a time magic school

*Note:

-This game is based on an exercise from GameDevTv's Club challenge

Hope you have fun! :)
